title: Tough f/b combos (Adkins Hunky Nap Carolina Brights)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Tough f/b combos (Adkins Hunky Nap Carolina Brights)
posts.post_content:
Prices include shipping and assume a no-fee payment method.  I have to collect sales tax from WA state buyers.

Adkins AB350 PSA 2.5 $2000
Dessau AB350 PSA 3.5 (highest graded) $500 SOLD
Kisinger Cycle 350 PSA 4.5 $800 SOLD
Lajoie throw EPDG PSA 2 $1500
McLean Carolina Brights PSA A (tape on back) $1200 SOLD
Shaw Cycle 350 PSA 4.5$1000 SOLD
Wilhelm Cycle 460 PSA 2 (highest graded at PSA - 5 total between SGC and PSA) $1000 SOLD
Geyer Cycle 460 SGC 2 $800
Seymour Cycle 460 SGC 1.5 $700
Wallace Hindu SGC 1 $700
Great looking cards, Luke! Good luck- Trent King

Thank you Trent.

Bump for a few new ones.
